definition: connected by air, sea traffic or service
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Chapter five is t the point-setting principle of the aquatic oil station and the suggestion to the navigation environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 第五章为水上加油站设置原则和通航环境保护建议。

sentences.english: The next day, restrictions were eased across much of Europe and flights began.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，欧洲大部分的飞行限制松动，飞机开始通航。

sentences.english: At present, Three Gorges five-level ship lock is the largest navigation facility in the world.
sentences.chinese: 三峡五级船闸是目前世界上规模最大的通航设施。

sentences.english: Vessel Gargantua is not complying with the traffic regulations.
All the main rapid reaches cannot meet the navigation expectation of ten-thousand-tonnage fleet.
sentences.chinese: 各主要滩段均不能满足万吨级船队的通航要求。

sentences.english: From Xi'an Xianyang International Airport also add a shipping point.
sentences.chinese: 从此西安咸阳国际机场又新增一个通航点。

sentences.english: The ship lock ranks Grade III and has the navigation standard of four kiloton ship in one uplifting.
sentences.chinese: 船闸为Ⅲ级，通航标准为一顶四艘千吨级。

sentences.english: The navigable channels have all been charted.
sentences.chinese: 所有可以通航的水道都已在海图上标出来。

sentences.english: All the locks are controlled by engineers from the navigation control room.
sentences.chinese: 所有船闸都有通航调度室的工程师控制。

sentences.english: For the study of navigation hydraulics, it is of some reference value.
sentences.chinese: 对今后研究通航水力学问题具有一定的参考价值。

sentences.english: It can improve the navigational condition of the upper reaches of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 三峡工程可以改善长江上游航道的通航条件。

sentences.english: The main chamber will be closed to navigation during this 2-week period.
sentences.chinese: 在这两周内，主船闸将关闭，从而不能通航。

sentences.english: This scarcity represents a bottle-neck for the development of general aviation.
sentences.chinese: 这种差距表明了现在是中国通航航空发展的瓶颈期。
由汤比格比河通航墨西哥湾。

sentences.english: The harbor is blocked from the rest of the world .
sentences.chinese: 这个港口与世界各地的通航被阻断了。

sentences.english: Miter gate is one kind of steel gates the most widely applied in lock engineering.
sentences.chinese: 闸门是通航建筑物中运用最广泛的门型之一。

definition: (of aircraft) to take off and land
to stop running (of flight of shipping service)/to suspend service (flight, sailing)/to interrupt schedule
